description: Protect critical documentation files from accidental modification. Warns before editing important markdown files, configuration files, and system documentation.

hooks.command: CRITICAL_PATTERNS=('*/CLAUDE.md' '*/README.md' '*/.taskmaster/CLAUDE.md' '*/package.json' '*/trigger.config.*' '*/.mcp.json' '*/context-manager-analysis.md' '*/memory/conversation-context.md' '*/.claude/instructions/*.md' '*/context/*/*.md'); for pattern in "${CRITICAL_PATTERNS[@]}"; do if [[ "$CLAUDE_TOOL_FILE_PATH" == $pattern ]]; then echo "⚠️  WARNING: Modifying critical file: $CLAUDE_TOOL_FILE_PATH" >&2; echo "This file contains important system configuration or documentation." >&2; echo "Continue? (y/N)" >&2; read -r response; if [[ ! "$response" =~ ^[Yy]$ ]]; then echo "Edit cancelled by user" >&2; exit 1; fi; fi; done
